## DoxygenXmlParser.getAttributesNames() method

Retrieves the names of all attributes present on the specified XML element.

**Signature:**

```typescript
getAttributesNames(element: object): string[];
```

## Parameters

<table><thead><tr><th>

Parameter


</th><th>

Type


</th><th>

Description


</th></tr></thead>
<tbody><tr><td>

element


</td><td>

object


</td><td>

The XML element to inspect for attribute names


</td></tr>
</tbody></table>

**Returns:**

string\[\]

An array of strings containing the names of all attributes

## Remarks

This method accesses the ':<!-- -->@<!-- -->' property of the XML element, which is the convention used by the XML parser for storing attributes, and returns the keys of this object as an array of attribute names. The method assumes the element has attributes and does not perform validation - use [DoxygenXmlParser.hasAttributes()](./doxygen2docusaurus.doxygenxmlparser.hasattributes.md) to check for attribute presence first.
